FuncDef: This command specifies the range of multicast group addresses which should be used by the router as the Rendezvous Point (RP). Theconfig>router>pim>rp>static>addressa.b.c.dimplicitly defaults to deny all for all multicast groups (224.0.0.0/4). A group-prefix must be specified for that static address. This command does not apply to the whole group range.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the multicast group IPv6 address expressed in dotted decimal notation. Values-grp-ipv6-address x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
Specifies the prefix length of the IPv6 address. Values-8 to 128.
